html:
11.23.20  4:17 pm   i have an addiction to your music

      oh man, it looks like i'm gonna need to make stronger doses because your tolerance has probably gone up

11.23.20  3:17 pm   is Earth flat?

      no, but with a little luck and skill maybe you could flatten it

11.23.20  2:03 pm   Are you musically self taught?

     yes

     Was music important to you growing up?

      yes

11.23.20  1:42 pm   Do you find it hard to write songs? What are some of your inspiration's?

      trees, but also the branches they are connected to, especially that one huge branch that goes directly into the ground

11.23.20  12:54 pm   How do I become more normal?

      how about making a new years resolution and then giving up on it somewhere around january 9th

11.23.20  11:40 am   why is your video taking 2 months to make?

      because i'm stupid. that's always been the reason. i am looking for ways to make myself smart, which doesn't always work, mostly because i'm stupid

11.23.20  11:04 am   How many easter eggs are there?

      how big is the basket

11.23.20  9:25 am   i am writing a book!! can i ask where you get inspiration for your projects, as i'm currently having some rather bad writer's block

      there is no block. what's happening is, you are temporarily not a writer

11.23.20  9:07 am   what song are you most proud of?

      i would prefer to be proud of a new one

11.23.20  9:06 am   What is your opinion of onions

      it's like a baseball you can eat

11.23.20  6:48 am   What is your opinion on the word "moist"?

      it's the only word i know

11.23.20  6:10 am   Are you human

      oh that would explain this weird tingling sensation i've been having

11.23.20  6:04 am   In "La de da de da de da de day oh" you rhymed "mall" 3 times, was there any hidden meaning behind that?

      yes, this is what it is: After selecting this song for recording, i felt deep dread and regret the next day. basically there is a lot of anxiety around selecting a song to record and do a music video for, because unfortunately, for some unknown reason, i always make my songrecordings and videos very complicated. so it is a large commitment when choosing a song. At the time of selection, the song was only written up to the end of the first chorus. So i was feeling a deep amount of regret, the day after selecting it. but changing it would increase all doubts all around, because it had been a very thorough selection process, and if i invalidated that it would cast even larger shadows of doubt on the entire ability to select a song. So i was sitting in the waiting chairs for a haircut, just being very unsure of how to carry forward with the song, ... i had already attempted to change my mind earlier in the morning, to a much slower and sadder song. and i found myself circling back again to 'la de da', and just at the exact moment i was getting into the haircut chair, i let my mind turn to what i think might happen next, in the writing. obviously we are going into the second verse. And it's moments like these, when we say 'what if', that suddenly a blitz of writing comes. The first 3 lines of the second verse came at me very quickly. the relentlessness of the word 'mall' had a nice momentum to it, and certainly helped to plunge me into confidence that the song was the right choice, and by the time i got into the chair, i was certain i would be doing that song. the 4th line, however, did not come at all, and i had to force it later in the actual writing session and i am to this day not proud of it. so if i could summerize the answer to your original question, the meaning of the triple mall is 'momentum'

11.23.20  5:17 am   any plans to write a song about going to mars?

      sure. that sounds like a pretty normal and reasonable activity, likely to show up in songs. i've certainly used it before and i would use it again

11.23.20  4:13 am   How do you feel about a lot of musicians analyzing your music?

      pretty good. i've surely already analyzed myself to flipping heck up and back, so it's nice to share the burden

11.23.20  3:38 am   What is the meaning of "Talent"

      sheer unphased normalcy

11.23.20  2:32 am   What is the reason of making might quit?

      i'm trying to make as many songs as i can, with videos. that is 1 of them

11.23.20  2:10 am   do you like star wars

      sometimes i wonder if there will ever be peace, in the stars

11.23.20  1:54 am   if you had to use one word to describe how you feel about your work, what would it be

      POSSIBLE. perhaps this is just wishful thinking, but i shall continue wishing

11.23.20  1:37 am   how do you come up with song lyrics

      musically

11.23.20  12:57 am   would you ever be interested in giving classes on "how to bill wurtz" and you talk about how you produce videos like "history of the entire world, i guess" and show some tips and tricks to make videos and songs more  p u n g a n t  and  s p i c y?

      i always try to give as many useful tips as i can, even right here on this questions page

11.23.20  12:43 am   Why are your videos so mesmerizing and good? Tell me your secret.

      i'm still trying to figure it out

11.23.20  12:34 am   Would you consider releasing groups of songs with a similar tone like an album but still release them on a regular basis?

      it seems to me, any similarity that tends to occur on albums, amongst the songs, is usually because of the time the songs were written or recorded. music created around the same time period will often have some similarities. Going against this, we can deliberately do a song 'differently' from the previous song. i think both of these trends naturally seem to occur regardless of whether the songs are done on an album or not

11.23.20  12:25 am   do you ever struggle with that thing where you spend so much time working on a song that you start to hate it and lose all confidence in most of if not every musical decision in it

      yes

11.23.20  12:03 am   is there a reasoning behind some of the songs with "jarring" endings? ex. i just did a bad thing, la de da de da de da de day oh. because i find them quite jarring, which is kind of fun, but also jarring

      the majority of other songs i've heard, i don't like the endings. so, the only way i can remedy that in my own writing is to try to do it in a way that i like, which will admittedly seem different than what someone else might do

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

      how about becoming an art teacher

      peace

      we'll see

11.22.20  9:55 pm   underrated holidays?

      jan 1

     yes

      this is very important

      no it's not

11.22.20  8:48 pm   should I use real violins with mediocre players on my recordings, or vsti violins which I can use to write cool fast rise and fall things. Are vsti good, basically. I'm a folk player and new to production. Thanks bill 

      a good rule of thumb would be to use whichever one you think sounds better

11.22.20  8:42 pm   sometimes there'll be a song i particularly like or dislike specifically because of its chords/notes/harmonic choices/etc. then i'll tell a friend this opinion and they'll say "well i don't care about notes, i just like/dislike when the instruments make x sound/have x rhythm/etc."

do you think it's really possible for people to not care about the notes? like, they've gotta feel the harmonic effect on some level, even if they don't know exactly what the notes are, right?

      music is hypnotic. it works in very deep subconscious ways. any attempt to actually describe what's going on will be 'creative' at best

11.22.20  8:13 pm   Favorite file format?

      txt

11.22.20  7:37 pm   in when i get older, the lyrics in the lyrics tab says "but it feels like the song knows me" but in the song its sounds like "and it feels like the song knows me"... why?

      that's a hidden message, telling you you're the chosen one

11.22.20  7:32 pm   what is the antonym of fuck

      bless

But what made the first something did something make the first something then if that something did what made that something?

      was it you

      to blow your mind
